            bool(
                str(
                    cell
                ).strip()
            )
    )

# Columns to Convert

    'sw_fan',
    'star_trek_fan',
    'seen_first',
    'seen_second',

    'seen_fourth',
    'seen_fifth',

    'knows_expand_universe',
    'fan_expand_universe'
]

# Convert Columns 
for col in bool_columns:
    df[col + '_bool'] = df[col].apply(to_bool)
